body:
So i was rummaging through my old bandicam videos of when i was still very new to Avicus when i found this video.

A game of elimination with 48 PEOPLE.

So I thought I'd share it with everybody for some Elimination nostalgia.

Many of the people in this video are not active anymore sadly ;-;

But you'll see some names in there that you'll recognize :D

Enjoy

title: 2014 Large game of Elim
